<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img decoding="async" width="1024" height="682" src="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-34-1024x682.png" alt="loyalty program statistics" class="wp-image-16918" title="Eye-Opening Loyalty Program Statistics You Need to Know 1" srcset="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-34-1024x682.png 1024w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-34-300x200.png 300w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-34-768x512.png 768w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-34.png 1280w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></figure>



<p>Image source:<a href="https://www.pexels.com/photo/working-macbook-computer-keyboard-34577/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> Pexels</a></p>



<p>Customer loyalty is one of the most valuable assets you can have. It’s no secret that <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbesbusinesscouncil/2022/12/12/customer-retention-versus-customer-acquisition/?sh=148b7daf1c7d" target="_blank" rel="noopener">finding new customers is much more expensive</a> than retaining existing ones.</p>



<p>Loyal customers not only generate recurring revenue, but they also act as brand advocates, spreading positive word-of-mouth and attracting new customers. </p>



<p>Creating a loyalty program is one effective strategy for building customer loyalty and boosting customer experience. A loyalty program is a structured marketing effort that rewards customers for their repeat business or other desired behavior, such as referrals or social media engagement. </p>



<p>However, not all loyalty programs are created equal. Designing a program that aligns with your brand values, customer preferences, and business goals is essential. </p>



<p>In this article, we will share the latest customer loyalty statistics to show you why exactly working on building a loyalty program can be one of the best decisions you can make for your business as a whole.</p>



<p>So, let’s start with some basic information!</p>



<h2 class="wp-block-heading">The importance of customer loyalty programs</h2>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img decoding="async" width="1000" height="500" src="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-30.png" alt="customer loyalty programs" class="wp-image-16914" title="Eye-Opening Loyalty Program Statistics You Need to Know 2" srcset="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-30.png 1000w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-30-300x150.png 300w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-30-768x384.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1000px) 100vw, 1000px" /></figure>



<p>Image source: <a href="https://truelist.co/blog/customer-loyalty-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">TrueList</a></p>



<p>The global loyalty management market was worth USD 8.75 billion in 2021, and experts predict that it will <a href="https://www.researchandmarkets.com/reports/4745415/global-loyalty-management-market-growth" target="_blank" rel="noopener">grow at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 16.88% from 2022 to 2027</a>.</p>



<p>Improving customer loyalty can have a significant positive impact on your business. Here are some critical advantages of enhancing customer loyalty:</p>



<ol>
<li><strong>Improved customer retention</strong>: A loyalty program can help you retain customers you worked hard to attract in the first place, preventing them from leaving and going to your competitors.</li>



<li><strong>Increased customer lifetime value</strong>: Increasing the income you earn per customer can improve <a href="https://passkit.com/blog/customer-acquisition-channels/">customer acquisition</a> ROI. A loyalty program is a practical way to achieve this.</li>



<li><strong>Improved brand recognition</strong>: Customers who love your loyalty program will more likely praise your business to their network, resulting in word-of-mouth recommendations and improved brand recognition.</li>



<li><strong>Increased customer satisfaction</strong>: Demonstrating that you care about your loyal customers will enhance their happiness, resulting in more sales, better reviews, and positive brand perception.</li>



<li><strong>Improved customer insights</strong>: A loyalty program provides valuable customer behavior and preferences data. This information lets you refine your marketing and sales efforts and allocate your budget more effectively.</li>
</ol>



<p>Overall, investing in a well-designed loyalty program is a wise decision to help your business significantly. Let’s discuss how.</p>



<h2 class="wp-block-heading">How customer loyalty boosts your business</h2>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="1024" height="921" src="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-33-1024x921.png" alt="benefits of a customer loyalty program" class="wp-image-16917" title="Eye-Opening Loyalty Program Statistics You Need to Know 3" srcset="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-33-1024x921.png 1024w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-33-300x270.png 300w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-33-768x690.png 768w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-33.png 1139w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></figure>



<p>Image source: <a href="https://www.zendesk.com/blog/loyalty-rewards/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Zendesk</a></p>



<p>Here are some reasons why customer loyalty programs are helpful for your business:</p>



<ol>
<li><strong>Improved marketing and sales ROI</strong>: By earning more from every customer through loyalty programs, you can quickly recoup your initial investment in acquiring them.</li>



<li><strong>Increased revenue</strong>: Loyalty programs incentivize customers to remain loyal to a brand, leading to more frequent and higher-value purchases and increased revenue.</li>



<li><strong>Decreased costs</strong>: Selling to existing customers is less expensive than acquiring new ones. Offering discounts or exclusive access to new products to loyal customers can encourage repeat purchases, resulting in decreased costs for marketing purposes.</li>



<li><strong>Staying ahead of the competition</strong>: By retaining customers through effective loyalty programs, you prevent customers from switching to your competitors. Providing excellent customer service is essential in keeping customers, as poor customer service is a leading reason customers change brands.</li>
</ol>



<p>Effective loyalty programs can be crucial in building a successful and sustainable business in a competitive market. However, you must use the appropriate tools to create an optimal business loyalty program.</p>



<p>That’s where PassKit comes in.</p>

<p>Now that you understand the significance of customer loyalty, the advantages of implementing loyalty programs, and the ideal platform to achieve your objectives, it’s essential to review some crucial statistics that reflect the industry’s current state. </p>

<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Loyalty program statistics to boost your decision-making</h2>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="1024" height="725" src="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-37-1024x725.png" alt="loyalty program statistics" class="wp-image-16921" title="Eye-Opening Loyalty Program Statistics You Need to Know 6" srcset="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-37-1024x725.png 1024w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-37-300x212.png 300w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-37-768x544.png 768w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-37-1536x1088.png 1536w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-37.png 1600w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></figure>



<p>Image source:<a href="https://www.pexels.com/photo/man-holding-credit-card-and-browsing-smartphone-on-street-6353669/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> </a><a href="https://queue-it.com/blog/loyalty-program-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Queue-it</a></p>



<p>If you still need convincing about the importance of loyalty programs, here are some eye-opening loyalty program statistics that will help you change your mind.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Demographics of loyalty program members</h3>



<p>According to industry statistics, <a href="https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/crowdtwist-consumer-loyalty-study-shows-87-of-gen-z-consumers-want-omnichannel-loyalty-programs-300729728.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">younger consumers are more interested</a> in shopping and participating in loyalty programs. </p>



<p>However, <a href="https://www.statista.com/statistics/1125630/loyalty-card-usage-rate-for-main-shopping-in-the-uk-by-age/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">older and middle-aged populations</a> tend to be more consistent and reliable when it comes to their loyalty to a brand. It can be beneficial for businesses, as these demographics are likely to spend more money themselves and may also purchase for their children and grandchildren. </p>



<p>In addition, <a href="https://www.lendingtree.com/credit-cards/study/loyalty-programs/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">women are more likely to register and use loyalty programs</a> than men. These statistics highlight important business considerations when developing loyalty programs and marketing campaigns.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Customer retention rates with loyalty programs</h3>



<p>Improving customer retention, even by a small percentage, such as 5%, can significantly impact your profits. </p>



<p><a href="https://www.invespcro.com/blog/customer-loyalty-programs/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Research has shown</a> that such an increase in loyalty can result in a 25% or more increase in average profit per customer. It is essential since acquiring new customers can be costly and time-consuming. </p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Customer lifetime value with loyalty programs</h3>



<p>This statistic refers to the customer lifetime value improvement. By increasing customer loyalty by just 7%, a brand can expect a significant increase of <a href="https://www.moengage.com/blog/increasing-customer-lifetime-value-with-loyalty-programs/#:~:text=A%20brand%20loyalty%20survey%20shows,pay%20to%20attract%20new%20customers." target="_blank" rel="noopener">up to 85% in the money customers spend over their lifetime</a>.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Customer engagement with loyalty programs</h3>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="1024" height="668" src="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-36-1024x668.png" alt="loyalty program engagement statistics" class="wp-image-16920" title="Eye-Opening Loyalty Program Statistics You Need to Know 7" srcset="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-36-1024x668.png 1024w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-36-300x196.png 300w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-36-768x501.png 768w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-36.png 1280w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></figure>



<p>Image source:<a href="https://www.pexels.com/photo/man-holding-credit-card-and-browsing-smartphone-on-street-6353669/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> Pexels</a></p>



<p>Having engaged customers is crucial for businesses as it can <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbesbusinesscouncil/2022/02/18/loyalty-programs-the-new-pillar-for-next-gen-customer-engagement/?sh=51f4a737427d" target="_blank" rel="noopener">increase the share of wallet, profitability, and revenue by 23%</a>. Implementing a loyalty program is one effective method to keep customers engaged and loyal to your brand.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Redemption rates of loyalty program rewards</h3>



<p>An <a href="https://www.customerinsightgroup.com/loyaltyblog/loyalty-marketing/redemption-rates" target="_blank" rel="noopener">average redemption rate of approximately 14%</a> is typical for loyalty programs. However, reaching above 20% is considered a significant achievement. </p>



<p>If your redemption rate falls below 15%, it may indicate that you need to change your loyalty program.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Customer satisfaction with loyalty programs</h3>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="1024" height="682" src="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-39-1024x682.png" alt="loyalty program customer satisfaction statistics" class="wp-image-16923" title="Eye-Opening Loyalty Program Statistics You Need to Know 8" srcset="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-39-1024x682.png 1024w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-39-300x200.png 300w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-39-768x512.png 768w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-39.png 1280w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></figure>



<p>Image source:<a href="https://www.pexels.com/photo/blonde-woman-standing-near-the-checkout-counter-6925810/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> Pexels</a></p>



<p><a href="https://success.qualtrics.com/rs/542-FMF-412/images/ROI%20of%20customer%20experience%202020.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Research shows</a> that 94% of Americans are willing to recommend a product they consider “very good,” making word-of-mouth referrals from loyal customers a valuable asset. </p>



<p>Investing in premium loyalty programs can ensure customer satisfaction and increase the likelihood of positive recommendations.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The impact of rewards on customer behavior</h3>



<p><a href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/247615019_The_role_of_loyalty_programs_in_behavioral_and_affective_loyalty" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Research indicates</a> that reward programs do not alter customer behavior but strengthen loyalty. </p>



<p>It is logical since the purpose is to reward current customers rather than entice new ones to make purchases, resulting in genuine supporters of your product, service or brand.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The impact of personalization in loyalty programs</h3>



<p>To create a loyal customer base, providing a personalized experience is essential. While more than half of customers expect personalization, <a href="https://www.salesforce.com/resources/articles/customer-expectations/?sfdc-redirect=369" target="_blank" rel="noopener">two-thirds feel they are treated like numbers</a>. </p>



<p>It highlights the importance of avoiding one-size-fits-all solutions and focusing on detailed segmentation to create genuine customer connections.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The impact of social media on loyalty programs</h3>



<p>Social media channels have become essential for existing and potential customers to interact with brands. Therefore, they play a crucial role in establishing brand loyalty. </p>



<p>However, instead of solely relying on direct advertisements, creating brand experiences on social media channels can lead to a <a href="https://ogilvy-sociallab.be/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/SOCIAL-MEDIA-TRENDS-2023.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener">significant increase of 70% in ROI</a>.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The role of mobile in loyalty programs</h3>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="1024" height="684" src="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-38-1024x684.png" alt="mobile loyalty programs" class="wp-image-16922" title="Eye-Opening Loyalty Program Statistics You Need to Know 9" srcset="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-38-1024x684.png 1024w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-38-300x200.png 300w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-38-768x513.png 768w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-38-1536x1025.png 1536w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-38.png 1600w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></figure>



<p>Image source:<a href="https://unsplash.com/photos/XvS-uKUoUao" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> Unsplash</a></p>



<p>It’s well-known that customers prefer using mobile devices for loyalty program engagement. As many as <a href="https://www.insiderintelligence.com/content/consumers-opt-mobile-interactions-with-loyalty-programs" target="_blank" rel="noopener">72.4% of customers subscribe to loyalty programs while browsing online</a>. </p>



<p>It highlights the importance of PassKit, which can blend effortlessly with customers’ regular routines and help your business stay in line with the latest <a href="https://passkit.com/blog/consumer-trends/">consumer trends</a>.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The effectiveness of email marketing in loyalty programs</h3>



<p>Although emails have been a long-standing online communication channel, they remain an effective way to promote products and services. </p>



<p><a href="https://www.salecycle.com/blog/stats/18-essential-email-marketing-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Recent surveys indicate</a> that up to 59% of respondents admitted that emails significantly influenced purchasing decisions. </p>



<p>Therefore, creating a <a href="https://passkit.com/blog/personalized-customer-experience-in-2022/">personalized customer experience</a>, with rewards and loyalty emails, can help engage customers and increase sales. </p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The impact of gamification on loyalty programs</h3>



<p>Studies have shown that <a href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/336375023_Gamification_and_Online_Consumer_Decisions_Is_the_game_over" target="_blank" rel="noopener">incorporating game elements</a> into marketing activities throughout the customer journey can significantly impact customer behavior and decision-making, making gamification an incredibly effective strategy.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The impact of tiered loyalty programs</h3>



<p>Loyalty programs can have varying impacts, depending on whether they are paid or free. </p>



<p>Customers who subscribe to paid loyalty programs are <a href="https://www.mckinsey.com/capabilities/growth-marketing-and-sales/our-insights/coping-with-the-big-switch-how-paid-loyalty-programs-can-help-bring-consumers-back-to-your-brand" target="_blank" rel="noopener">60% more likely to make purchases</a>, while those who join free programs are only 30% more likely to do so. </p>



<p>However, since more customers opt for free programs, they can still generate more sales in absolute numbers.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The impact of exclusivity on loyalty programs</h3>



<p>Offering exclusive customer access is a <a href="https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s11747-022-00897-0" target="_blank" rel="noopener">highly effective sales strategy</a> that has delivered results in multiple industries. </p>



<p>Therefore, it is an excellent addition to your brand’s loyalty program. </p>



<p>By providing exclusive access to only your most loyal customers, you can make them feel special, increasing sales.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The impact of referrals on loyalty programs</h3>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="1020" height="623" src="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-32.png" alt="referral progam statistics" class="wp-image-16916" title="Eye-Opening Loyalty Program Statistics You Need to Know 10" srcset="https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-32.png 1020w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-32-300x183.png 300w, https://passkit.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/image-32-768x469.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1020px) 100vw, 1020px" /></figure>



<p>Image source: <a href="https://financesonline.com/referral-marketing-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Finances Online</a></p>



<p><a href="https://dma.org.uk/article/why-consumer-trust-in-more-important-than-ever" target="_blank" rel="noopener">According to research</a>, 81% of customers rely on recommendations from friends and family rather than brands. </p>



<p>Hence, incentivizing loyal customers to recommend your products to their network can benefit both parties. </p>



<p>You can gain new, reliable customers who receive discounts, and those who refer you also get a bonus.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The effectiveness of point-based vs. tiered loyalty programs</h3>



<p>Since an average company loses <a href="https://www.zippia.com/advice/customer-loyalty-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">up to 30% of customers per year</a> due to the lack of loyalty, it makes sense to spend some time and develop several customer loyalty programs. </p>



<p>It’s good to know that <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/blakemorgan/2020/05/07/50-stats-that-show-the-importance-of-good-loyalty-programs-even-during-a-crisis/?sh=502735522410" target="_blank" rel="noopener">37% of customers</a> are willing to pay to upgrade to an enhanced loyalty program tier. </p>



<p>Conversely, <a href="https://www.invespcro.com/blog/customer-loyalty-programs/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">almost 70% of shoppers claim that the availability of loyalty/rewards program points</a> influences their decision on where to shop. Furthermore, 57.4% of consumers join such programs to save money, while 37.5% join to receive rewards.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The role of customer data in loyalty programs</h3>



<p>According to research, <a href="https://www.mckinsey.com/~/media/McKinsey/Industries/Retail/Our%20Insights/Perspectives%20on%20retail%20and%20consumer%20goods%20Number%208/Perspectives-on-Retail-and-Consumer-Goods_Issue-8.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener">75% of consumers in the US</a> have adopted new shopping behaviors in response to the COVID-19 pandemic due to changes in prices, inflation, store closures, or logistics issues. </p>



<p>While these changes present new opportunities for brands, they also signal the importance of building a loyal customer base.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The impact of loyalty programs on revenue growth</h3>



<p><a href="https://passkit.com/blog/customer-experience-optimization/">Customer experience optimization</a> can bring significant returns on investment, with <a href="https://www.zippia.com/advice/customer-retention-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">60% of customers making another purchase</a>. Additionally, repeat customers tend to recommend the brand to others and leave positive reviews, leading to long-term revenue growth.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">The effectiveness of different types of rewards in loyalty programs</h3>



<p>Which type of customer loyalty management program you pick is often determined by the type of business you run. </p>



<p>A survey has revealed that <a href="https://blog.accessdevelopment.com/2021-customer-loyalty-statistics" target="_blank" rel="noopener">84% of retailers</a> who have implemented a premium loyalty program rate the profitability of their program at eight or higher out of 10. It indicates that point-based loyalty programs can successfully boost customer engagement and drive business profits.</p>



<p>The <a href="https://antavo.com/reports/global-customer-loyalty-report-2022/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Global Customer Loyalty Report 2022</a> found that businesses with tiered loyalty programs reported a return on investment 1.8 times higher than those without tiers.</p>



<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Loyalty program statistics: The bottom line</h2>



<p>The statistics about customer loyalty speak for themselves, demonstrating the significant benefits loyalty programs can bring to your business. </p>



<p>While advanced <a href="https://passkit.com/blog/6-top-customer-loyalty-apps-2021-review/">customer loyalty apps</a> like PassKit can make these programs more efficient and hassle-free for you and your customers, it’s up to you to develop and implement a compelling idea. </p>



<p>If you’re still stuck on where to start, here are some excellent <a href="https://passkit.com/blog/customer-loyalty-program-ideas/">customer loyalty program ideas</a> to help get your creative juices flowing.</p>



<p>You’ve already learned enough about customer loyalty statistics, so it’s time to take action. </p>



<p><a href="https://app.passkit.com/signup">Sign up for PassKit</a> and launch your customer loyalty rewards program today. </p>



<h2 class="wp-block-heading">FAQs about loyalty program statistics</h2>



<p>Here are the answers to frequently asked questions that will help you understand the importance of running a loyalty campaign.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">What percentage of customers join a loyalty program?</h3>



<p>Studies have shown that <a href="https://www.pymnts.com/study/relationship-commerce-brand-engagement-subscriptions-memberships-loyalty-programs/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">up to 79% of customers</a> tend to establish some relationship with the brands they purchase from. </p>



<p>It could be through subscribing to newsletters, becoming members of loyalty programs, or other similar actions that foster a sense of connection with the brand.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">What are the statistics for loyal customers?</h3>



<p>There are several statistics related to loyal customers:</p>



<p>Based on <a href="https://financesonline.com/customer-loyalty-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">recent statistics on customer loyalty</a>, most customers (54.7%) are loyal to only 1 to 5 brands, whereas 31.1% of customers are loyal to 6 or more brands.</p>



<p>Customers who are members of loyalty programs <a href="https://queue-it.com/blog/loyalty-program-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">tend to generate 12-18% more revenue growth per year</a> than non-members. The loyalty programs that perform the best increase revenue from customers who use them by 15-25% each year.</p>



<p>Brands that understand their customers can retain their loyalty, as <a href="https://www.smallbizgenius.net/by-the-numbers/customer-loyalty-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">56% of customers remain loyal to such brands</a>. Furthermore, existing customers contribute 65% of a company’s business. Increasing customer retention by a mere 5% can lead to a 25-95% profit increase.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Do more than 90% of companies have a customer loyalty program?</h3>



<p>Determining an exact number is difficult, as it would require a global survey of all companies. However, many successful businesses offer rewards to their loyal customers, incentivizing them to continue patronizing the brand. </p>



<p>With the availability of tools like PassKit, implementing a loyalty program is not limited to large enterprises, as it only requires an internet connection to get started.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Do 79% of consumers say loyalty programs make them more likely to continue doing business with brands?</h3>



<p>Studies have revealed that <a href="https://www.merkle.com/thought-leadership/white-papers/2022-loyalty-barometer-report" target="_blank" rel="noopener">79% of customers</a> consider brand loyalty crucial when purchasing. </p>



<p>This statistic proves that loyalty campaigns can significantly impact customer engagement and retention. </p>



<p>Therefore, there is no reason not to consider implementing a customer loyalty program of your own using tools such as PassKit.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">What are the statistics for customer retention?</h3>



<p>To put it in perspective, on average, a company loses <a href="https://www.zippia.com/advice/customer-retention-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">between 10% to 25% of its customers annually</a>. However, the average customer retention rate across all industries is approximately 75.5%.</p>



<p><a href="https://www.annexcloud.com/blog/21-surprising-customer-retention-statistics-2021/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">According to research</a>, 91% of customers are inclined to buy from brands offering relevant and meaningful promotions.</p>



<p>Regarding <a href="https://blog.hubspot.com/service/customer-retention" target="_blank" rel="noopener">customer retention rates</a>, the retail industry has a rate of 63%, while banking has a rate of 75%, telecom has a rate of 78%, IT has a rate of 81%, and insurance has the highest rate of 83%.</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading">Do 43% of customers spend more money on brands they are loyal to?</h3>



<p><a href="https://www.fundera.com/resources/brand-loyalty-statistics" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Statistics show</a> that 43% of customers worldwide tend to spend more money on brands they are loyal to. Although building loyalty may require some time and effort, the rewards can be significant, making it a worthwhile investment.</p>
